Analysis of On-line Searching Costs .A Robertson, S.E. Datta, S. A project was undertaken to discover the major determinants of the costs of searching, on-line, on a practical reference retrieval system (SCISEARCH).. The methodology and some results of this project are reported.. Controlled searches were undertaken to isolate the effect of each of a number of variables.. A model involving several of the major variables was then developed.. The general approach proved to be (in this case) both feasible and useful.. .X 18	1	468 28	1	468 124	1	468 125	1	468 127	1	468 128	1	468 129	2	468 130	1	468 145	1	468 157	1	468 167	1	468 190	1	468 191	1	468 197	1	468 211	2	468 214	1	468 218	1	468 223	1	468 225	1	468 234	1	468 243	1	468 280	1	468 307	1	468 330	1	468 378	2	468 381	1	468 389	1	468 393	1	468 440	1	468 450	1	468 451	1	468 452	2	468 453	1	468 459	1	468 467	1	468 468	6	468 484	1	468 492	1	468 494	1	468 495	1	468 506	1	468 508	3	468 511	2	468 512	2	468 514	3	468 517	1	468 518	3	468 520	2	468 521	1	468 523	4	468 524	2	468 525	1	468 526	2	468 528	1	468 529	1	468 530	1	468 534	1	468 546	1	468 547	1	468 553	1	468 576	1	468 579	1	468 580	1	468 594	1	468 595	1	468 603	1	468 604	2	468 606	1	468 609	2	468 610	1	468 611	1	468 612	2	468 615	1	468 619	1	468 622	1	468 623	1	468 625	2	468 626	1	468 629	1	468 630	2	468 631	1	468 632	1	468 633	1	468 634	1	468 636	1	468 637	1	468 639	1	468 642	1	468 646	2	468 647	1	468 648	1	468 650	1	468 651	1	468 692	1	468 696	1	468 699	2	468 700	1	468 703	1	468 705	2	468 707	1	468 708	1	468 723	1	468 726	2	468 727	2	468 728	2	468 729	1	468 730	1	468 731	2	468 732	1	468 733	1	468 734	1	468 736	1	468 738	1	468 739	1	468 740	1	468 741	1	468 742	1	468 743	1	468 744	1	468 752	1	468 754	1	468 755	1	468 765	1	468 785	1	468 812	1	468 813	1	468 814	1	468 818	1	468 820	3	468 822	3	468 823	1	468 826	1	468 827	3	468 829	1	468 866	1	468 870	1	468 873	1	468 879	1	468 883	1	468 895	1	468 925	1	468 943	1	468 944	1	468 1004	1	468 1035	1	468 1070	1	468 1078	2	468 1085	1	468 1089	2	468 1091	3	468 1143	1	468 1207	1	468 1264	3	468 1282	1	468 1297	1	468 1302	1	468 1303	2	468 1356	2	468 1364	1	468 1366	1	468 1367	1	468 1368	2	468 1370	1	468 1372	2	468 1373	1	468 1374	2	468 1375	1	468 1376	1	468 1377	1	468 1390	1	468 1396	1	468 1401	1	468 1437	1	468 1437	1	468
